title: The Illusions of Hope
description: A young woman is thrown into a whirlwind of unfortunate events after waking up in the middle of nowhere with no recollection of her past. Who is she? How did she end up in such a predicament? Despite her fragile mental state, she embarks on a quest for answers, but what sheâ€™ll uncover will either set her free or take her over the precipice of a mental breakdown.
author: Wiss Auguste
